item.title: How to add a blog to Blogdown
item.description: Pre-requisites Create from scratch Clone or open the blog repository from github Create a post using “Addins” dropdown Change/check your date format Write a kickass post Compile your new work using Blogdown Push your post to the website Create from existing Rmd Pre-requisites Install blogdown and Hugo in R-Console https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/installation.html Create from scratch Creating it from scratch is probably the easiest since you can run and test your code as you type it up.
